2023.title: Google Analytics
2023.description: Web analytics platform to track website traffic and user behaviour.
2023.note: Listed among best tools in 2023 (TextMaster Digital Marketing Tools List).

2023.title: SEMrush
2023.description: Comprehensive SEO and content-marketing toolkit for keyword research, site audits and competitor analysis.

2023.title: Mailchimp
2023.description: Email-marketing platform for campaigns, list management, automation and reporting.
2023.note: Mentioned as a key tool for 2023 marketing strategies.

2023.title: Canva
2023.description: Design tool to create social graphics, marketing visuals, posters and simple videos.
2023.note: Listed among best digital-marketing tools in 2023.

2023.title: Hootsuite
2023.description: Social-media management platform to schedule posts, monitor channels, and analyse social engagement.
2023.note: Included in 2023 tools list for social media management.

2023.title: ActiveCampaign
2023.description: Marketing automation and CRM tool to nurture leads, automate email workflows and integrate marketing with sales.
2023.note: Mentioned in 2023 tool recap as a key automation solution.
